title: T206 The Monster Sport Americana booklet, 1980, Bill Heitman
author: OldSchoolBaseball

posts.post_title: T206 The Monster Sport Americana booklet, 1980, Bill Heitman
posts.post_content:
Came across this vintage booklet, checklist, informational booklet by Bill Heitman, 1980.

The book condition is NM+ and is 32 pages I believe.  Not opening the booklet to scan each page....pictured are the front and back cover only.
SOLD. delivered.  PayPal FF:  [url]three4moore@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks,

David
Any chance one of these are still available?

Most collectors are interested in the pamphlet’s significance in T206 history.

It is a hot item though for Farrah Fawcett collectors.

The “Farrah” story I learned from Bill himself when he signed my copy.
